column4: I thought about installing ubuntu but when I went to try and install ubuntu-desktop it gave a warning about breaking but did not say what it would break
give us the exact message, we'll tell you what it means
it does not give any message just said break how can I find out what the message might be ?
it can't just say break things, it has to say something about what you are doing.  Do you mean during the boot loader installation?
